channel.title: vkv export on vkv
channel.description: Recent content in vkv export on vkv

item.title: output formats
item.description: base vkv export -p secret -f=base secret/ ├── v1: admin [key=value] │ └── sub=******** ├── v1: demo │ └── foo=*** └── sub/ ├── v1: demo │ ├── demo=*********** │ ├── password=****** │ └── user=***** └── sub2 └── v2: demo [admin=false key=value] ├── admin=*** ├── foo=*** ├── password=******** └── user=**** yaml vkv export -p secret -f=yaml secret/: admin: sub: '********' demo: foo: '***' sub/: demo: demo: '***********' password: '******' user: '*****' sub2/: demo: admin: '***' foo: '***' password: '********' user: '****' json vkv export -p secret -f=json { "secret/": { "admin": { "sub": "********" }, "demo": { "foo": "***" }, "sub/": { "demo": { "demo": "***********", "password": "******", "user": "*****" }, "sub2/": { "demo": { "admin": "***", "foo": "***", "password": "********", "user": "****" } } } } } export vkv export -p secret -f=export export admin='key' export demo='hello world' export foo='bar' export password='password' export sub='password' eval $(vkv export -p secret -f=export) echo $admin key policy vkv export -p secret -f=policy PATH CREATE READ UPDATE DELETE LIST ROOT secret/sub/sub2/demo ✖ ✖ ✖ ✖ ✖ ✔ secret/admin ✖ ✖ ✖ ✖ ✖ ✔ secret/demo ✖ ✖ ✖ ✖ ✖ ✔ secret/sub/demo ✖ ✖ ✖ ✖ ✖ ✔ markdown vkv export -p secret -f=markdown | PATH | KEY | VALUE | VERSION | METADATA | |----------------------|----------|-------------|---------|-----------------------| | secret/admin | sub | ******** | 1 | key=value | | secret/demo | foo | *** | 1 | | | secret/sub/demo | demo | *********** | 1 | | | | password | ****** | | | | | user | ***** | | | | secret/sub/sub2/demo | admin | *** | 2 | admin=false key=value | | | foo | *** | | | | | password | ******** | | | | | user | **** | | |
